spell.name: Ocular Necrosis
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a creature you can see within range. On a hit, you wrack the target with a deadly toxin that causes their eyes to bleed. The creature takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
